import React from 'react' import { Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../Rating' import products from '../../products' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const {image, name, rating, numReviews, price} = products.find(({_id}) => _id === match.params.id); console.log(match.params.id); return ( <> {name}
${price} ) } export default ProductScreen
